nodes.text: The Gannaria system was a star system located within the Trilon sector, a part of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. It was notable for the production of spice and was the origin point of the Gannarian narco-spice variant.

The area of space surrounding the system was explored between the years 1000 and 25 BBY. The Human smuggler Han Solo visited the Gannaria system on a mission for a member of the Hutt species at some point between 14 and 0 BBY. The population of the system around the year 25 ABY was less than 1 million.
The Gannaria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square H-15.
